https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/bv8EAeWoIlwVwUVFwIkBQUt0jk4.jpg When Mariam, a young Tunisian woman, is raped by police officers after leaving a party, she is propelled into a harrowing night in which she must fight for her rights even though justice lies on the side of her tormentors.
